name: TC ENERGY CORPORATION
description: Development and operation of energy infrastructure
sampleDescriptions: Legislative issues affecting energy infrastructure, the safe and efficient transportation of natural gas and liquids energy, renewable electricity policy, and alternative fuel sources like renewable natural gas and hydrogen
